---
title: "Appendix: PSID (A1, A2, A3, A5, A6, A8, A9, A10, A11, Figure A1)"
---

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(haven)
library(fixest)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)

dir.create("../../../Tables/r", recursive = TRUE, showWarnings = FALSE)
dir.create("../../../Figures/r", recursive = TRUE, showWarnings = FALSE)

extract_fixest_terms <- function(m, keep, model_id) {
  ct <- as.data.table(coeftable(m), keep.rownames = "term")
  if ("Estimate" %in% names(ct)) setnames(ct, "Estimate", "estimate")
  if ("Std. Error" %in% names(ct)) setnames(ct, "Std. Error", "std_error")
  if ("t value" %in% names(ct)) setnames(ct, "t value", "stat")
  if ("z value" %in% names(ct)) setnames(ct, "z value", "stat")
  if ("Pr(>|t|)" %in% names(ct)) setnames(ct, "Pr(>|t|)", "p_value")
  if ("Pr(>|z|)" %in% names(ct)) setnames(ct, "Pr(>|z|)", "p_value")
  if (!("estimate" %in% names(ct))) ct[, estimate := NA_real_]
  if (!("std_error" %in% names(ct))) ct[, std_error := NA_real_]
  if (!("stat" %in% names(ct))) ct[, stat := NA_real_]
  if (!("p_value" %in% names(ct))) ct[, p_value := NA_real_]
  ct <- ct[term %in% keep, .(model = model_id, term, estimate, std_error, stat, p_value)]
  ct
}

save_models <- function(models, keep, stem, caption = stem) {
  tab <- rbindlist(lapply(seq_along(models), function(i) extract_fixest_terms(models[[i]], keep, paste0("M", i))), fill = TRUE)
  tab[, term := factor(term, levels = keep)]
  setorder(tab, term, model)
  tab[, term := as.character(term)]
  fwrite(tab, sprintf("../../../Tables/r/%s.csv", stem))
  tex <- knitr::kable(tab, format = "latex", booktabs = TRUE, caption = caption, digits = 3)
  writeLines(tex, sprintf("../../../Tables/r/%s.tex", stem))
  knitr::kable(tab, caption = caption, format = "html", digits = 3)
}

make_sample <- function(d, tagged = TRUE) {
  x <- copy(d)
  setorder(x, ID, year)
  x[, num := .N, by = ID]
  if (tagged) x <- x[tag_10_90 == 1]
  x[num > 1]
}

psid <- as.data.table(read_dta("../../../data/PSID/psid_new_final_lag_LS.dta"))
ctrl <- "income + income2 + l1_income + l1_income2 + liquid_wealth + liquid2 + illiquid_wealth + illiquid2"
base_rhs <- paste("GENDER + FAM_NUM_TOTAL + HEAD_MARITAL + UNEMP + unemp_state +", ctrl, "+ i(HD_RACE) + i(HEAD_EDU)")
```

## この章でコードがしていること（1分で把握）

| セクション | コードでしていること | 主な入力 | 主な出力 |
|---|---|---|---|
| A1 | フルサンプルの要約統計を作る | `psid_new_final_lag_LS.dta` | `table_A1_r.csv` |
| A2/A3/A5/A6 | サンプル定義・経験定義・クラスタリング・重みの頑健性回帰を推定する | 同上 | `table_A2_r.*` 〜 `table_A6_r.*` |
| A8/A9/A10/A11 | 追加統制・測定誤差・流動性相互作用の頑健性回帰を推定する | 同上 | `table_A8_r.*` 〜 `table_A11_r.*` |
| Figure A1 | 失職イベント前後の所得イベントスタディ係数を算出・描画する | 同上 | `figure_A1_coeff_r.csv`, `figure_A1_r.pdf` |

## A1 (Summary: full sample)

```{r}
a1 <- make_sample(psid, tagged = FALSE)
a1[, `:=`(
  Unempl_Exp_Personal_lambda1 = exp_personal_lagged_1 * 100,
  Unempl_Exp_Personal_lambda3 = exp_personal_nat_l3 * 100
)]
vars <- c(
  "age", "FAM_NUM_TOTAL", "TOTAL_CONSUMP1", "INCOME_TOTAL_FAM",
  "LIQUID_WEALTH", "ILLIQUID_WEALTH", "WEALTH_TOTAL",
  "Unempl_Exp_Personal_lambda1", "Unempl_Exp_Personal_lambda3",
  "exp_state_nat_lagged_1", "exp_state_nat_lagged_l3"
)
summ <- rbindlist(lapply(vars, function(v) {
  x <- a1[[v]]
  data.table(variable = v, mean = mean(x, na.rm = TRUE), sd = sd(x, na.rm = TRUE), p10 = quantile(x, 0.1, na.rm = TRUE), p50 = quantile(x, 0.5, na.rm = TRUE), p90 = quantile(x, 0.9, na.rm = TRUE), N = sum(!is.na(x)))
}))
fwrite(summ, "../../../Tables/r/table_A1_r.csv")
knitr::kable(summ, caption = "Table A1 (R): Summary Statistics (Full Sample)", format = "html", digits = 3)
```

## A2, A3, A5, A6

```{r}
a <- make_sample(psid, tagged = FALSE)
a_tag <- make_sample(psid, tagged = TRUE)

# A2
a2 <- list(
  feols(as.formula(sprintf("total ~ exp_personal_lagged_1 + %s | age + GSA + year + ID", base_rhs)), a, vcov = ~cohort),
  feols(as.formula(sprintf("total ~ exp_state_nat_lagged_1 + %s | age + GSA + year + ID", base_rhs)), a, vcov = ~cohort),
  feols(as.formula(sprintf("total ~ exp_state_nat_lagged_1 + exp_personal_lagged_1 + %s | age + GSA + year + ID", base_rhs)), a, vcov = ~cohort),
  feols(as.formula(sprintf("total ~ exp_personal_nat_l3 + %s | age + GSA + year + ID", base_rhs)), a, vcov = ~cohort),
  feols(as.formula(sprintf("total ~ exp_state_nat_lagged_l3 + %s | age + GSA + year + ID", base_rhs)), a, vcov = ~cohort),
  feols(as.formula(sprintf("total ~ exp_state_nat_lagged_l3 + exp_personal_nat_l3 + %s | age + GSA + year + ID", base_rhs)), a, vcov = ~cohort)
)
save_models(
  a2,
  keep = c("exp_personal_lagged_1", "exp_state_nat_lagged_1", "exp_personal_nat_l3", "exp_state_nat_lagged_l3"),
  stem = "table_A2_r",
  caption = "Table A2 (R): Full Sample"
)

# A3
a3 <- list(
  feols(as.formula(sprintf("total ~ exp_personal_nat_1g + %s | age + GSA + year + ID", base_rhs)), a_tag, vcov = ~cohort),
  feols(as.formula(sprintf("total ~ exp_state_nat_lagged_1g + %s | age + GSA + year + ID", base_rhs)), a_tag, vcov = ~cohort),
  feols(as.formula(sprintf("total ~ exp_state_nat_lagged_1g + exp_personal_nat_1g + %s | age + GSA + year + ID", base_rhs)), a_tag, vcov = ~cohort),
  feols(as.formula(sprintf("total ~ exp_personal_nat_3g + %s | age + GSA + year + ID", base_rhs)), a_tag, vcov = ~cohort),
  feols(as.formula(sprintf("total ~ exp_state_nat_lagged_3g + %s | age + GSA + year + ID", base_rhs)), a_tag, vcov = ~cohort),
  feols(as.formula(sprintf("total ~ exp_state_nat_lagged_3g + exp_personal_nat_3g + %s | age + GSA + year + ID", base_rhs)), a_tag, vcov = ~cohort)
)
save_models(
  a3,
  keep = c("exp_personal_nat_1g", "exp_state_nat_lagged_1g", "exp_personal_nat_3g", "exp_state_nat_lagged_3g"),
  stem = "table_A3_r",
  caption = "Table A3 (R): Gap-Year Experience"

# A5
a5 <- list(
  feols(as.formula(sprintf("total ~ exp_personal_lagged_1 + exp_state_nat_lagged_1 + %s | age + GSA + year + ID", base_rhs)), a_tag, vcov = ~cohort + year),
  feols(as.formula(sprintf("total ~ exp_personal_lagged_1 + exp_state_nat_lagged_1 + %s | age + GSA + year + ID", base_rhs)), a_tag, vcov = ~ID),
  feols(as.formula(sprintf("total ~ exp_personal_nat_l3 + exp_state_nat_lagged_l3 + %s | age + GSA + year + ID", base_rhs)), a_tag, vcov = ~cohort + year),
  feols(as.formula(sprintf("total ~ exp_personal_nat_l3 + exp_state_nat_lagged_l3 + %s | age + GSA + year + ID", base_rhs)), a_tag, vcov = ~ID)

save_models(
```

## Figure A1

```{r}
fa <- make_sample(psid, tagged = FALSE)
setorder(fa, ID, year)
fa[, event_date := as.integer(EMPLOY_STATUS == 3)]
for (k in 1:7) fa[, paste0("F", k) := as.integer(shift(event_date, n = k, type = "lag") == 1L), by = ID]
for (k in 0:5) fa[, paste0("L", k) := as.integer(shift(event_date, n = k, type = "lead") == 1L), by = ID]
for (k in c(paste0("F", 1:7), paste0("L", 0:5))) fa[is.na(get(k)), (k) := 0L]

form <- as.formula(paste(
  "income ~", paste(c("L5", "L4", "L3", "L2", "L1", "L0", "F1", "F2", "F3", "F4", "F5", "F6", "F7",
                     "GENDER", "HEAD_MARITAL", "i(HD_RACE)", "i(HEAD_EDU)", "age"), collapse = " + "),
  "| ID + year"
))
mfa <- feols(form, fa, vcov = ~ID)
ct <- as.data.table(coeftable(mfa), keep.rownames = "term")
ct <- ct[term %in% c("L5","L4","L3","L2","L1","L0","F1","F2","F3","F4","F5","F6","F7")]
ct[, displacement := fifelse(grepl("^L", term), -as.integer(sub("L", "", term)), as.integer(sub("F", "", term)))]
ct[, `:=`(lb = Estimate - 1.96 * `Std. Error`, ub = Estimate + 1.96 * `Std. Error`)]
setorder(ct, displacement)
fwrite(ct, "../../../Figures/r/figure_A1_coeff_r.csv")
knitr::kable(
  ct[, .(term, Estimate, `Std. Error`, displacement, lb, ub)],
  caption = "Figure A1 (R): Event-Study Coefficients",
  format = "html",
  digits = 3
)

p <- ggplot(ct[displacement >= -5], aes(displacement, Estimate)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = "gray50") +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color = "gray50") +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = lb, ymax = ub), width = 0.15) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Years since displacement", y = "Estimation Coefficient")
ggsave("../../../Figures/r/figure_A1_r.pdf", p, width = 7, height = 4.5)
p
```
